rules_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on this Subroutine.
Whenever this Subroutine runs, you may sacrifice it. If you do, destroy all nonland permanents with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on it.
notes:
!tokens Program A ERR;Program B ERR;Program C ERR
!
art5
flagged (sideboard)

!prepend (As this enters, insert it into one of your three programs. At your first main phase each turn, the next program runs all its Subroutines.)\n
